The Wright brothers, Wilbur and Orville, were the first people to successfully fly a powered, heavier-than-air aircraft. On December 17, 1903, they flew the first successful powered flight in a heavier-than-air machine.
The Wright brothers, Wilbur and Orville, were the first people to successfully fly a powered aircraft. They flew the first successful powered, heavier-than-air flight on December 17, 1903.
